title: Web Developer Portfolio
description: This is the portfolio you are looking at now! It is hand-crafted by myself using Vue.js along with a couple other helper libraries. It is a single page app using a Router to switch pages, with a fancy background that reacts to navigation. Loads data like the cards from this page from json files too!

title: Cave Monster Slayer - 2D Game Engine
description: College project in 2019 for one of my Computer Science classes: 2D Game Engine in C++. I drew all the animations myself using Krita and a pen tablet, and programmed the entire game engine myself using the SDL library to help render images and play sounds.
